sentences.sentence: This Anklet is all Hand Crafted and very well made.
sentences.translation: 这脚链都是手工制作，非常好。

sentences.sentence: The wind carries away in glee the tinkling of your anklet bells.
sentences.translation: 风欢喜地带走了你脚踝上的叮当声。

sentences.sentence: The wind carries away in glee the tinkling of your anklet bells.
sentences.translation: 风高兴地带走了你踝铃的丁当。
